reviews.text: This is a perfectly acceptable place to stay in Barcelona with a good location but I would not return.
reviews.title: Average

reviews.text: The check-in and other services are at the Casa Fuster hotel next door which is a very upscale hotel and the staff definitely make you feel like a second-class guest with a very snobbish, poor attitude towards guest at the SCB. I doubt that they would do it with the guests at the CF.
reviews.title: Great Location. Reception staff is a bit weird.

reviews.text: The bedroom and the bathrooms are rather cramped and the feeling of spaciousness that one expects out of a suite is simple not there. The kitchen is not available for stays less than 3 nights which means that there is no fridge available,
reviews.title: 5 star Apartment in Barcelona
